DOC.brief_title: Blood Sugar Responses Physical Activity Level Intensity
DOC.detailed_description: 3 group participant fulfil criterion : sedentary ( < 30mins phys activity p/day ) active ( > 30 min phys act p/day ) active ( > 60 min phys act p.day ) invite attend laboratory session two separate occasion separate one week ask : fast overnight baseline six capillary ( finger-prick ) blood sample take period two hour follow consumption 50 gram glucose . The blood sample produce standard glucose 'curve ' used calculate incremental area curve identify similarity difference three group response . Hypothetically may different level intensity physical activity affect result active individual produce flatter better-controlled blood sugar response inactive subject . The Null-hypothesis would difference response . possible , instance , low-dose glucose otherwise healthy group individual discernible affect curve . Physical activity assess questionnaire interview . Anthropometric measure ( height , weight body composition ) take use stadiometer bio-electrical impedance unit ( Bodystat 1500 , Body Stat : Isle man UK ) time laboratory measure . No participant data take kind read participant information sheet sign informed consent .
